xuiIcon
directive in module xui

Description

XUI Icon description.

Usage

as element:
<xui-icon
       icon-size="{string}"
       icon="{xui.IconName}"
       icon-color="{string}"
       icon-hover-color="{string}"
       tool-tip="{string}"
       status="{xui.IconStatusName}"
       counter="{string}"
       text-alignment="{string}"
       is-dynamic="{boolean}"
       [tooltip-append-to-body="{boolean}"]
       fill-container="{boolean}">
</xui-icon>

Parameters

ParamTypeDetails
icon-sizestring

Values: "xsmall", "small", "medium", "large", or "xlarge".

(default: "medium")

iconxui.IconName

The icon to be rendered.

icon-colorstring

The color to be applied to the icon.

icon-hover-colorstring

The color to be applied to the icon on hover.

tool-tipstring

Tooltip for the icon.

statusxui.IconStatusName

The status icon to be applied in addition to the current icon.

counterstring

The counter property to be applied in addition to the current icon. This has to be a valid integer number.

text-alignmentstring

Whether or not the icon has spacing for text associated with it. Values: "none", "left", "right", or "left-right".

(default: "none")

is-dynamicboolean

If "true", this icon will set watches on the icon, icon-size, and status attributes in order to properly update itself in real-time.

tooltip-append-to-body
(optional)
boolean

Appends the tooltip to '$body' instead of the parent element.

fill-containerboolean

Icon fills its container, so the hover area can be set. The icon always stays centralized.

(default: false)

Example
